scripts.start-container: docker compose build && docker compose up -d
scripts.restart-container: npm run stop-container && npm run start-container
scripts.recreate-container-db: docker compose exec rv-backend npm run db-rollback && docker compose exec rv-backend npm run db-migrate && docker compose exec rv-backend npm run db-seed
scripts.recreate-container: npm run restart-container && npm run recreate-container-db
scripts.test-container: docker compose exec rv-backend npm test
